description:
Minagi Mikoto plays an important role in http://anidb.net/ch5913 [Tokiha Mai]`s story, while she has her own plot as well. She is a third-grade middle school student in the same class as http://anidb.net/ch5929 [Yuuki Nao]. She loves to be with Mai, often at her side or clinging to her, and playing with Mai`s large breasts. She also has a problem with spicy food, and consuming it often sends her into rampages while looking for water. Mikoto is usually seen with her two-handed sword, Miroku, either in hand or in a black sword bag.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Minagi Mikoto
